model.comment: SMC4 is a stationary decoder, but it can be programmed in the usual way

variable.label: Servo 1 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

enumChoice.choice: Move servos to the other end

variable.label: Servo 2 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Servo 3 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Servo 4 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Output 5 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Output 6 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Output 7 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Output 8 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

enumChoice.choice: Mode 1 - Servos 2 Pos, all outputs unique address
Mode 2 - Servos 2 Pos, outputs 5 - 8 have servo address
Mode 3 - Servos 3 Pos, all outputs unique address
Mode 4 - Inputs control servos, outputs 5 - 8 have unique address

variable.label: Ops Mode Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-99

enumChoice.choice: Will flash when servo 1 is in the cw position
Will flash when servo 1 is in the ccw position

variable.label: Route Group 1-8 Address
variable.tooltip: Range 1-2040

variable.label: Route Group 9-16 Address

label.label: Use this number to set the address number
of the device the output is connected to.

display.tooltip: Enables fixed output state at power on

label.label: This is the same as a Loco address
The Custom Programmer format is recommended
---- Sets the SMC4 to a paricular test state - Use to help adjust servos ----
Changes the value of CV7 (Version ID) as displayed in DP
Test State may change when Version ID is read

display.tooltip: Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Sets the action of the output
Will flash when issued a throw command

label.label: ---- Sets the output state to always be the same at power on ----
Only applies if Option 1 is selected
